item.description:
We'll be attending the 7 PM screening; we hear there may be a discussion with the director immediately following.

If between our members and those of the Atheists of Greater Lowell, we can get 25 people to attend, we'll be able to secure tickets at a discount, $7.50 each. So please, RSVP if you can join the outing.

The new movie Creation, about Charles Darwin is going to be showing at Kendall SQ. More details will be announced as we get them.

The movie is about Charles Darwin, his family, and "On the Origin of Species". It's based on Randal Keynes's book "Annie's Box". Randal is Darwin's great-great-grandson. Eugenie Scott of the NCSE wrote a review encouraging people to do what the supporters of "Expelled" did: "get lots of people to show up on opening weekend to give the movie a big ratings boost."http://pandasthumb.or....
item.name: The new film "Creation" about Darwin, at Kendall Square
